groups._comment_group_id: Replace '' with your actual group ID. Add more group IDs as needed.

35859090._comment_uploader_cookies: List of .ROBLOSECURITY cookies for accounts that can upload to this group.

_comment_sleep_each_upload: Seconds to pause between each successful asset upload.
_comment_assets_price: The price (in Robux) to set for uploaded assets.
_comment_description: The default description text for uploaded assets.
_comment_max_nudity_value: NSFW filter sensitivity (0.0 to 1.0). Higher values allow more. Recommended: 0.1-0.3.
_comment_upload_without_blacklisted_word: If true, attempts to upload even if blacklisted words are found in the name (proceed with caution).
_comment_upload_amount: Maximum number of assets to attempt uploading per run.
_comment_delete_all_images_on_restart: If true, clears the src/assets/shirts and src/assets/pants folders on startup.
_comment_dupe_check: Enable/disable checking for duplicate images before uploading.

duplicate_detection._comment_use_advanced: Use multiple hashing algorithms for stricter checking (recommended).
duplicate_detection._comment_min_algorithm_matches: How many hashing algorithms must agree for an image to be considered a duplicate.
duplicate_detection._comment_thresholds: Maximum difference allowed for each hash type (lower = stricter).

_comment_search_strategy: Settings for how to find assets on the catalog.

search_strategy._comment_min_price: Minimum price of assets to search for (Robux).
search_strategy._comment_max_price: Maximum price of assets to search for (Robux, 0 = no limit).
search_strategy._comment_limit: Maximum number of assets to fetch per search request (max 120).

_comment_custom_watermark: Settings for applying a custom watermark to downloaded assets.

custom_watermark._comment_enabled: Set to true to apply the custom watermark.
custom_watermark._comment_text: The text content of the watermark.
custom_watermark._comment_font_path: Path to the .ttf or .otf font file. Use forward slashes (/) or double backslashes (\).
custom_watermark._comment_position: General position if 'replace_area_enabled' is false ('bottom_center', 'bottom_left', etc.).
custom_watermark._comment_color: General RGBA color for the watermark text [R, G, B, Alpha (0-255)]. Used when 'replace_area_enabled' is false.
custom_watermark._comment_replace_area_coords: Coordinates [x0, y0, x1, y1] of the rectangle to replace. MEASURE THESE CAREFULLY.
custom_watermark._comment_replace_area_color: RGB color [R, G, B] for the background of the replaced area.
custom_watermark._comment_text_color_override: RGBA color [R, G, B, Alpha] for the text specifically inside the replaced area.
